short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free vehicle report, last recorded mileage, salvage search of previous auctions, and more...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate toolbar for salvage buyers. The simple, intuitive and powerful browser plugin to help you find the right car at salvage auctions. Totally free to use with automatic salvage search. Offers free HPI check on all lots. Supports most of the UK's salvage sites. Protects you from buying a lemon!
